description: Constitutional court ruling does not directly affect the European Central Bank's coronavirus aid.
title: German court criticises European Central Bank crisis bond-buying
title_page: German court criticises European Central Bank crisis bond-buying - BBC News
maintext: It is now up to the ECB to explain how its mass bond-buying programme is "proportionate". The Bundesbank could pull out if it is not satisfied, in three months' time - which would be a big blow to the eurozone.
